title: FS: Several T206s in high grades....Most are PSA 7's... many sold, 5 new ones added!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Several T206s in high grades....Most are PSA 7's... many sold, 5 new ones added!
posts.post_content:
Patsy Dougherty (Port.) SCap 150, PSA 7, monster oversized borders,mint corners, just a killer card!!.......$1000.///////**SOLD**
Mike Donlin Pied 150, SGC 86, corners are 8's! incredible card.....$1250
Boss Schmidt (Port.) SGC 84......Razor sharp card, .....$575
Jack Chesbro Pied 150, GAI 7, perfect centering, card was graded when GAI first started, killer card......$1750
John McGraw (Port., no cap) Pied 150, PSA 7, card looks like a 9, razor corners......$2000
John McGraw (Port., Cap) SCap 350-460 fact. 42 OPrint, SGC 84, perfect centering, incredibly rare back.....$2000
Germany Schaefer (Det.) SCap 150 fact. 25, PSA 7, impossible back, only 3 graded of all grades, this being by far the highest....$1500
Wild Bill Donovan (Port.) Pied 150, PSA 7, huge snow white borders, extremely tough card in high grade......$950.//////**SOLD**
Kid Elberfeld (fielding) SCap 350, PSA 7, tough common in high grade......$850////// **SOLD**
James Lafitte Pied 350 PSA 8(OC), tough SLer, highest ever graded! Well centered L-R, perfect corners........$875//////**SOLD**
Frank Chance (Yellow) SCap 350 PSA 6, corners are 9's. well centered l-r, top to bottom about 80-20....


Ed Killian (pitching) Pied 150, PSA 7, well centered......$700

Please send me your email for pics, these cards have been in my collection for years and won't disappoint......Thanks
